name: 'Red Haven's on Fire' Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
youthful; energetic.

	CJ said this to Toby while they were on the beach with Sam during a press conference.

questions.text: Who did Abbey make her new Chief of Staff?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Abbey asked Amy to get her out of situation and when Abbey saw how well Amy did it, Abbey asked her to be the new Chief of Staff. Back at Washington, Donna read a letter from Amy telling Josh that she was the First Lady's new Chief of Staff.

questions.text: What two cards could Charlie use for bail?
questions.explanation:
American Express and Visa.

	Toby was talking to Josh over the cell phone and Charlie could be heard ranting in the background about his bail.

questions.text: Who told Toby about the dangers of using a prostitute's cell phone to call Air Force One?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	After Sam said that Toby said, "You really gonna be teaching a seminar on call-girl caution? Really?"

questions.text: What country did the President insult?
questions.explanation:
France.

	While Sam was introducing the President, you could hear President Bartlet insulting France in the background.

questions.text: How many people did Leo say died at Red Haven?
questions.explanation:
17.

	In retaliation for rescuing the three soldiers, Red Haven was set on fire.

questions.text: Who had to tell the First Lady that she looked like a dilletante?
questions.explanation:
Charlie.

	CJ then told Charlie that she had to tell the President one day that he was wearing two different shoes.

questions.text: Toby has never been on a beach.
questions.explanation:
True.

	During a press conference Sam was having, CJ asked Toby if he had ever been on a beach and he told her no.

questions.text: Was there press waiting for Toby and Charlie when they got out of jail?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Toby thought they were safe until they walked outside and found the press waiting.

questions.text: Toby: "God save the President of the United States and ________  _______."
questions.explanation:
Sam Seaborn.

	This was Toby's toast with Sam before they left the bar at the end of the episode.
